Package org.webpki.json

Class JSONArrayWriter

java.lang.Object
org.webpki.json.JSONArrayWriter
public class JSONArrayWriter extends Object
Writes JSON arrays.

Data types are dealt with as in JSONObjectWriter.

See Also:
  • JSONObjectWriter.setArray(String)
  • setArray()
  • setArray(JSONArrayWriter)
  • JSONArrayWriter()

  • Constructor Details

    • JSONArrayWriter

      public JSONArrayWriter()
      For creating a JSON array.

      Note that this constructor can be used for creating a JSON structure where the outermost part in an array as well as for array sub-objects.

      See Also:
      • JSONObjectReader.getJSONArrayReader()
      • JSONObjectWriter.setArray(String, JSONArrayWriter)
      • setArray(JSONArrayWriter)

    • setArray

      public JSONArrayWriter setArray() throws IOException
      Create nested array.

      This method creates a new array writer at the current position.

      Returns:
      Array writer
      Throws:
      IOException

    • setArray

      public JSONArrayWriter setArray(JSONArrayWriter writer) throws IOException
      Create nested array.

      This method inserts an existing array writer at the current position.

      Parameters:
      writer - Instance of array writer
      Returns:
      Array writer
      Throws:
      IOException
